extracted_metadata.title: Eleven Wars against Palestinians: How Palestinians are coping with their Elimination - SOAS
extracted_metadata.description: Eleven Wars against Palestinians: How Palestinians are coping with their Elimination A Lecture by Salman Abu Sitta SOAS Webinar event 23 February 2012, 5.30 pm UK With Dr Howayda Al Harithy, PLSC Director at AUB. Host Dr Dina Matar, SOAS University of London
